Banner.subtitle: simple things with warmth and care

About.title: Welcome to cozy nest!
About.paragraph-1: Here handmade items come to life — recycled fabrics transform into tote, drawstring, cosmetic bags and flaxseed pillows, and yarn turns into socks, scarves, collars and amigurumi.
About.paragraph-2: I put care into every detail, sewing and crocheting in my cozy corner while gazing at the thuja trees outside my window.
About.paragraph-3: Inspired by nature, people, cats, and… Pinterest.

In-stock.title: products in stock
In-stock.paragraph-1: Here you can see what items are currently available. Click on any picture to view the photo carousel.

How-to-order.paragraph-1: While I’m working on the product page and the shopping cart features (sorry for the temporary inconvenience — stay tuned, the classic website is under development), you can place an order in the following way:
How-to-order.step-2: Take a screenshot of the selected item.
How-to-order.step-3: Send it to me by email or in a message on Instagram / Facebook.
How-to-order.paragraph-2: I’ll get in touch with you soon, confirm all the details, and help you place your order.
How-to-order.paragraph-3: If you don’t find exactly what you’re looking for — I’ll be happy to make a custom order for you. Believe me, I’ve got quite the stash of fabric and yarn.
